# serif

**Type Property**

The serif variant of the default typeface.

## Declaration

```swift
static let serif: UIFontDescriptor.SystemDesign
```

## Discussion

Using this constant with [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIFontDescriptor/withDesign(_:)] returns [https://developer.apple.com/fonts/].

## Typeface designs

- **default**: The default typeface for an app’s user interface.
- **rounded**: The rounded variant of the default typeface.
- **monospaced**: The monospace variant of the default typeface.
